price: اّيا نو پر چا چې د عذاب خبره ثابته شوې وي، نو ته هغه ژغورلى شې چې په اور كې وي؟
arabic: أَفَمَنۡ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: afaman ḥaqqa ʿalayhi kalimatu al-ʿadhābi afa-anta tunqidhu man fī al-nāri
